keywords.value: Grill Room, Four Seasons Restaurant (Manhattan, NY)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The building owner wants the restaurant out when the lease expires next year, so the two men who own and run it are closing in on a space downtown.

headline.main: The Fate of the Four Seasons Hangs in the Balance

snippet: The building owner wants the restaurant out when the lease expires next year, so the two men who own and run it are closing in on a space downtown.
abstract: Regular diners at the Four Seasons restaurant fret about its move from Midtown to downtown Manhattan when their lease expires in 2016.
